weka.core.converters

Class SemEvalToArff

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.converters.TweetCollectionToArff
      • weka.core.converters.SemEvalToArff

  • public class SemEvalToArff
extends TweetCollectionToArff
    Builds an arff dataset from the SemEval collection of tweets for sentiment analysis. More info about the task: https://www.cs.york.ac.uk/semeval-2013/task2/
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fjb11 at students.waikato.ac.nz)
